description: Thick leather body armor that has been hardened via chemical treatment.  Light and strong.
Leg and body armor made from the exoskeletons of insects.
Leg and body armor crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle.
Thick body armor made from furs.
Thick leather body armor.  Light and comfortable.
A suit of Gothic plate armor.  The metal shows signs of rust and corrosion, and the leather straps are tattered.
A light suit of plate armor with a 2mm thick chestpiece.  This one has been made with mild steel.

name.str: XL mild steel light plate armor

description: A light suit of plate armor with a 2mm thick chestpiece.  Made with tougher medium steel, this suit offers solid protection.

name.str: XL mild steel light plate armor

description: A light suit of plate armor with a 2mm thick chestpiece.  Made with high carbon steel, offering excellent protection.

name.str: XL high steel light plate armor

description: A light suit of plate armor with a 2mm thick chestpiece.  The mild steel has been case hardened, offering superior protection.

name.str: XL case hardened light plate armor

description: A light suit of plate armor with a 2mm thick chestpiece.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top-of-the-line protection.
A suit of plate armor with a 4mm thick chestpiece.  This one has been made with mild steel.
A suit of plate armor with a 4mm thick chestpiece.  Made with tougher medium steel, this suit offers solid protection.
A suit of plate armor with a 4mm thick chestpiece.  Made with high carbon steel, offering excellent protection.
A suit of plate armor with a 4mm thick chestpiece.  The mild steel has been case hardened, offering superior protection.

description: A heavy suit of plate armor with a 6mm thick chestpiece.  The medium steel has been quenched and tempered, offering top of the line protection.
Thick leather body armor that has been reinforced with strategically-placed metal plates.
An extremely heavy suit of ornamental armor.  The metal shows signs of rust and corrosion, and the leather straps are tattered.
Black plastic body armor plates used by riot police officers, back when they were just riots.  The word POLICE is emblazoned across the front.
An ornamental suit of Japanese samurai armor.
A suit of armor made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings to cloth wraps; the loose collection of plates provides decent but uncomfortable protection.
A suit of armor made from thick chunks of rubber tire secured by simple strings; the loose collection of rubber plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.

A white suit commonly worn by professional beekeepers with straps on your ankles and wrists to prevent bees from flying in.  It's not a very tough fabric, but it's lightweight and has plenty of storage thanks to a chest pocket.
A fully customized chainmail outfit, leaving the head uncovered.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized low steel chainmail outfit, leaving the head uncovered.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized medium steel chainmail outfit, leaving the head uncovered.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized high steel chainmail outfit, leaving the head uncovered.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized hardened steel chainmail outfit, leaving the head uncovered.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized tempered steel chainmail outfit, leaving the head uncovered.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized chainmail suit.  The metal shows signs of rust and corrosion.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized low steel chainmail suit.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized medium steel chainmail suit.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized high steel chainmail suit.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized hardened steel chainmail suit.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized tempered steel chainmail suit.  Combine with a gambeson or other padded layer for optimal protection.
A fully customized chainmail suit with integrated rubber boots that can be worn over your normal clothing.  The suit is conductively interconnected, protecting against electricity.
A simple hazardous materials handling suit.  Though somewhat restrictive and fragile, wearing it will provide excellent protection against ambient radiation.
A flame-resistant whole-body garment worn by firefighters as protection against extreme heat.  It requires a separate gas mask for full protection against smoke.

A thick jacket of quilted fabric, designed to be worn underneath mail or other armor.  Or worn on its own, if you can't afford proper armor.  Use it to loosen it if you want to wear it over your clothes.

use_action.msg: You loosen your %s.

description: A thick vest of quilted fabric, designed to be worn underneath mail or other armor.  This one has had its sleeves removed.  Use it to loosen it if you want to wear it over your clothes.

use_action.msg: You loosen your %s.

description: A thick jacket of quilted fabric, loosened to be worn as outer armor.  Use it to wear it tighter and be able to put proper armor over it.

use_action.msg: You adjust your gambeson a bit tighter.

description: A thick jacket of quilted fabric, loosened to be worn as outer armor.  Use it to wear it tighter and be able to put proper armor over it.

use_action.msg: You adjust your gambeson vest a bit tighter.

description: Thick pants made of quilted fabric, meant to be worn alongside a gambeson under or without armor.

Designed to mimic a thick jacket of quilted fabric that would be worn underneath mail or other armor.  A base layer of aramid fabric has had strips of soft body armor sewn into it to mimic quilting.  Use it to loosen it if you want to wear it over your clothes.

use_action.msg: You loosen your %s.

use_action.msg: You adjust your Kevlar gambeson a bit tighter.

name.str_pl: pairs of XL Kevlar arming pants

description: An impermeable whole-body garment worn as protection against hazardous materials.  Restrictive and fragile, wearing it will provide complete protection against ambient radiation.  It requires a separate gas mask for full protection.
A snug body suit made from thin and lightweight Nomex fire-resistant fabric.  Tough yet breathable, it is light and comfortable to wear under clothing.

A lightweight environmental suit incorporating Kevlar-lined boots and gloves, worn by Hub personnel in their rare forays aboveground.  Colored brown and blue, the white seal of Hub 01 is embroidered on both of its upper arms.  It requires a separate gas mask for full protection.
//: 2mm Nomex across the entire suit to provide hazmat properties. Hands and feet reinforced/shaped with other materials to provide full-body hazmat protection with minimal encumbrance.

material.//: Back of hand from the wrist to the knuckles can be stiffer but still needs a little flexibility. This area can afford the most thickness on gloves.
Molded knuckle plates, spacious enough inside the gloves to flex your knuckles fine while providing extra knuckle protection because busting your knuckles sucks.
A bit of Kevlar between the third and second knuckles, the part of the fingers where flexibility is least important.
Fingers need to be the most flexible and tactile part of the hand. Lycra/nylon blend (as the lycra material is defined) will give both those qualities while sacrificing the least protection.
The boots are reinforced with plastic plates throughout to protect against penetration.
The Kevlar is 2mm thick over most of the boots, and 1mm thick for flexible joints.
Steel shank for excellent arch support and to maintain boot shape for longevity.

use_action.msg: You slip out of the top of the suit and tie the sleeves around your waist.

description: A lightweight environmental suit incorporating Kevlar-lined boots, worn by Hub personnel in their rare forays aboveground.  Colored brown and blue, the upper portion has been tied around the waist casually.

material.//: The boots are reinforced with plastic plates throughout to protect against penetration.
The Kevlar is 2mm thick over most of the boots, and 1mm thick for flexible joints.
Steel shank for excellent arch support and to maintain boot shape for longevity.

use_action.msg: You untie the sleeves and put back on the top of the suit.

description: A single-piece brown and orange environmental suit, tailored in a way that slightly recalls a military flight suit.  The letters "X.E.D.R.A" are inscribed on its back, and a white shoulder patch on the right arm shows an arrow reaching within rings of concentric circles.

use_action.msg: You slip out of the top of the suit and tie the sleeves around your waist.

description: A single-piece brown and orange environmental suit, tailored in a way that slightly recalls a military flight suit.  The upper portion has been tied around the waist casually.

use_action.msg: You untie the sleeves and put back on the top of the suit.

description: The WebbStar moisture retention suit utilizes advanced technology to prevent up to 30% of moisture loss through perspiration.  The suit is powered by the micro-motions of the body, especially breathing and walking motions.  Because of this, your walking speed is impaired while wearing it.
A full-body cotton suit.  Makes the apocalypse a truly gentlemanly experience.
A leather bodysuit with padding in high-impact areas, meant for motorcyclists out on the track.  The leather is stiff but makes the armor much sturdier and more protective than lighter counterparts.

A military officer's dress uniform from before the Cataclysm, complete with rank and ribbons.  Just looking at it gives you an air of authority.  Perhaps not the most practical military wear, but a very stylish option.
A sage-green US military flight suit.  It has various insignia embroidered onto it.

A full body multilayered suit of plate armor with a 4mm thick chest piece.  The medium steel has been quenched, tempered and affixed over a full-body layered suit of weight-distributing straps.  The armor has an integrated breathable lycra jumpsuit and the torso has a spall liner of aramid panels.  Electronics run below the surface and circulate cool air to the skin, drawing power from your internal CBM reservoir.

use_action.msg: You turn the climate control on.
The %s pipes stop humming.

description: A full body multilayered light suit of plate armor with a 2mm thick chest piece.  The medium steel has been quenched, tempered and affixed over a full-body layered suit of weight-distributing straps.  The armor has an integrated breathable lycra jumpsuit and the torso has a spall liner of aramid panels.  Electronics run below the surface and circulate cool air to the skin, drawing power from your internal CBM reservoir.

use_action.msg: You turn the climate control on.
The %s pipes stop humming.

The armor has an integrated breathable lycra jumpsuit and the torso has a spall liner of aramid panels.
